name: Sorting test
description: Sorting is not available for the Form widget
descriptionHtml: Sorting is not available for the Form widget

steps.name: Authorization via KeyCloak with login: demo and password

testStage.description: Sorting is not available for the Form widget

steps.name: Selecting the Text sorting section in the left menu.
Selecting a tab Form on a page
Validation FormWidget by heading (Title) Form title
Validation of a field with the Text by heading Custom Field
Sorting
steps.statusMessage: Sorting not supported for inputs on Forms
